resume.title: Resume
resume.heading: Resume
resume.subtitle: Software Project Manager & Monetics Solutions Engineer with strong expertise in ATM deployment, NCR solutions, and full project lifecycle management.
resume.name: Iman Chabani
resume.summary_text: Software Engineer & Project Manager specialized in Monetics solutions, ATM software deployment, NCR technologies, and client-oriented project delivery.
resume.master_project: Graduation Project: Extraction of SURF descriptor and application to action recognition.
resume.bachelor_project: Graduation Project: SAT problem – deterministic algorithm for horn clauses.
resume.job1_desc1: Led deployment, troubleshooting, and training of NCR monetics solutions.
resume.job1_desc2: Managed full project lifecycle from pre-sales to pilot deployment.
resume.job1_desc3: Resolved 95% of incidents ensuring operational continuity.
resume.job1_desc4: Improved client satisfaction by 20% through feedback-driven improvements.
resume.job2_desc1: Deployed APTRA Vision, HDE, Camera Manager & NDC Enterprise.
resume.job2_desc2: Trained 50+ users and integrated solutions into ATM Masters.
resume.job3_desc1: Developed ATM and banking software in C#, ASP.NET.
resume.job3_desc2: Managed 50+ ATM Software Masters for multiple configurations.
resume.job4_desc1: Deployed and maintained ATM fleets (100+ machines).
resume.job4_desc2: Designed hardened OS images and secure XFS layers.

services.service1_desc: Custom ATM software solutions tailored to your banking needs
services.service2_desc: Expert deployment and configuration of NCR APTRA, NDC, and Vision systems
